text: The Amsterdam Museum is a museum in Amsterdam. Before 2011 it was called the Amsterdams Historisch Museum. It is in the old orphanage between Kalverstraat and Nieuwezijds Voorburgwal. ==History== Since 1975, the museum has been in a building that was first built in 1580 as Amsterdam's orphanage. The museum has paintings and old photographs and a cafe. ==References== Category:Museums in the Netherlands Category:Buildings and structures in Amsterdam
title: Amsterdam Museum
